channel.title: Matplotlib on (map solve problems)

item.title: install matplotlib on mac sierra
item.description: During matplotlib installation (for python3) some error may occured: ‘The following required packages can not be built: * freetype * png’ Thats why some additional steps may be required: install homebrew install pkg-config brew install pkg-config install freetype brew install freetype install matplotlib pip3 install matplotlib Enjoy!
